mapper.select: SELECT u.login_id, u.user_name, d.dept_name, u.email, u.phone, s.grade FROM enrollment e join student s on e.user_id = s.user_id join user u on s.user_id = u.user_id join department d on d.dept_id = s.dept_id WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY u.user_id, u.user_name
SELECT dept_name FROM department d join professor p on p.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE login_id = #{loginId})
